main event: A resident of Beaver, Pennsylvania reported a UFO sighting involving a bright light traveling silently in the sky.
interesting points: The object was approximately 300 feet in diameter and at an altitude of about 800 feet.,The object had 6 to 8 bright lights, with blue lights lasting for about 5 to 10 minutes.,Witness experienced a wave of force and intense heat that caused severe burning to his face and hands.,Witness lost sight in both eyes temporarily due to the radiant heat from the object.,Another witness, Mr. Houck, had been observing similar objects in the area for several days prior to the incident.
sighted object: unidentified flying object with bright blue and orange lights
witness description: Mr. Haden, a resident of Beaver, and Mr. Houck, a tool maker from Baden.
